pullrequest.title: Display sensors of links in world tab + display properties

content.raw:
@almin , it is a good idea to do a code check before submitting your pull requests. From gazebo's root folder, just run `sh tools/code_check.sh`. I'm seeing the following warnings for this branch, could you fix them please?

~~~
./gazebo/physics/Link.cc:435:  Blank line at the start of a code block.  Is this needed?  [whitespace/blank_line] [2]
./gazebo/physics/Link.cc:439:  Blank line at the start of a code block.  Is this needed?  [whitespace/blank_line] [2]
./gazebo/physics/Link.cc:451:  Line ends in whitespace.  Consider deleting these extra spaces.  [whitespace/end_of_line] [4]
./gazebo/physics/Link.cc:457:  Line ends in whitespace.  Consider deleting these extra spaces.  [whitespace/end_of_line] [4]
./gazebo/physics/Link.hh:772:  Could not find a newline character at the end of the file.  [whitespace/ending_newline] [5]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget_TEST.hh:80:  Line ends in whitespace.  Consider deleting these extra spaces.  [whitespace/end_of_line] [4]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget_TEST.hh:86:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget_TEST.cc:1420:  Could not find a newline character at the end of the file.  [whitespace/ending_newline] [5]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:241:  Blank line at the start of a code block.  Is this needed?  [whitespace/blank_line] [2]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:258:  Missing space before ( in if(  [whitespace/parens] [5]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:303:  Line ends in whitespace.  Consider deleting these extra spaces.  [whitespace/end_of_line] [4]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:427:  Line ends in whitespace.  Consider deleting these extra spaces.  [whitespace/end_of_line] [4]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:445:  Blank line at the start of a code block.  Is this needed?  [whitespace/blank_line] [2]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:465:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:2261:  Line ends in whitespace.  Consider deleting these extra spaces.  [whitespace/end_of_line] [4]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:2301:  Line ends in whitespace.  Consider deleting these extra spaces.  [whitespace/end_of_line] [4]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:3678:  Could not find a newline character at the end of the file.  [whitespace/ending_newline] [5]
~~~
content.html:
@almin , it is a good idea to do a code check before submitting your pull requests. From gazebo's root folder, just run sh tools/code_check.sh. I'm seeing the following warnings for this branch, could you fix them please?

./gazebo/physics/Link.cc:435:  Blank line at the start of a code block.  Is this needed?  [whitespace/blank_line] [2]
./gazebo/physics/Link.cc:439:  Blank line at the start of a code block.  Is this needed?  [whitespace/blank_line] [2]
./gazebo/physics/Link.cc:451:  Line ends in whitespace.  Consider deleting these extra spaces.  [whitespace/end_of_line] [4]
./gazebo/physics/Link.cc:457:  Line ends in whitespace.  Consider deleting these extra spaces.  [whitespace/end_of_line] [4]
./gazebo/physics/Link.hh:772:  Could not find a newline character at the end of the file.  [whitespace/ending_newline] [5]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget_TEST.hh:80:  Line ends in whitespace.  Consider deleting these extra spaces.  [whitespace/end_of_line] [4]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget_TEST.hh:86:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget_TEST.cc:1420:  Could not find a newline character at the end of the file.  [whitespace/ending_newline] [5]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:241:  Blank line at the start of a code block.  Is this needed?  [whitespace/blank_line] [2]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:258:  Missing space before ( in if(  [whitespace/parens] [5]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:303:  Line ends in whitespace.  Consider deleting these extra spaces.  [whitespace/end_of_line] [4]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:427:  Line ends in whitespace.  Consider deleting these extra spaces.  [whitespace/end_of_line] [4]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:445:  Blank line at the start of a code block.  Is this needed?  [whitespace/blank_line] [2]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:465:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:2261:  Line ends in whitespace.  Consider deleting these extra spaces.  [whitespace/end_of_line] [4]
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc:2301:  Line ends in whitespace.  Consider deleting these extra spaces.  [whitespace/end_of_line] [4]
